title: WARM AND CHEESY BACON DIP
directions: In a large bowl, stir together all of the ingredients until thoroughly combined. Spoon mixture into a 1½-quart baking dish.
Bake until the dip is bubbling and starting to brown on top, 30 to 35 minutes. Serve warm with chips, baguette slices or your favorite crackers.
ingredients: 8 ounces cream cheese, at room temperature
